title: Variations and extension of the convex–concave procedure

tldr.text: This work investigates the convex–concave procedure, a local heuristic that utilizes the tools of convex optimization to find local optima of difference of conveX (DC) programming problems, and generalizes the algorithm to include vector inequalities.
